articles.title: Astronomers Combine the Power of 64 Telescopes To Observe the Structure of the Universe - SciTechDaily
articles.description: An international team of astronomers has combined the power of 64 radio telescope dishes for the first time to detect the faint signatures of neutral hydrogen gas across cosmological scales. The feat was achieved using the South African-based MeerKAT telescop…
